org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.states

Class MoveToAvoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.states.AbState
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.states.MoveWithPID
        • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.states.MoveToAvoid

  • public class MoveToAvoid
extends MoveWithPID
    MoveToAvoid runs when the robot hits an obstacle. The class checks which sides are obscured and then moves to the detour which is closest to the ultimate target. The best side to avoid to is recalculated every time another obstacle is found. This class extends MoveWithPID.
    Author:
    Will (wrtc9)
